org.jgrapes.core

Interface DefaultChannel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Channel, Matchable

    public interface DefaultChannel
extends Channel
    An interface that can be used to specify the component's channel (see Component.getChannel()) as channel in handler annotations.

    Using the component's channel is the default if no channels are specified in the annotation, so specifying this channel only in the handler annotation is equivalent to specifying no channel at all. This special channel class is required if you want to specify a handler that handles events fired on the component's channel or on additional channels.

    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.jgrapes.core.Channel

        BROADCAST, SELF

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jgrapes.core.internal.Matchable
